# Interlude V: The Glass Border {.unnumbered}

> "The screen is not a window; it is a mirror that has been trained to show you only the things you already believe. It is the perfect border—invisible, impenetrable, and infinite."
> 
> — *The Reverse Maven*

Enter the Digital Wasteland. Here, we relinquish our taste to the algorithm and our time to the infinite scroll. We will learn to feel lonely in a room full of data, and find comfort in the variable reward.
